flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
72 led macro ring (72mm) with reverse EF mount adapter

With step Up rings can be used on any type of lens (52mm to 72mm)

Total current drain ~ 1.2Ah at 5-6V, (4xAA rechargeable battery or indoor use 6V DC adapter)

It is very lightweight: macro ring 76gr, battery holder with 4x AA inside 152gr

The circuit is designed to have two phases of light, full or half (only half of the LEDs light up)

Range is 5-20cm, ideal for super macro

Photo Galery
